timeline.message:
CLDR-14061 Generate VXML for version 38

-Skip non-xml files like .DS_Store

-Do not generate en.xml or root.xml

-Log when finished

timeline.bodyText: Not sure about this. Can you explain more what is happening?
timeline.author: macchiati

replies.bodyText:
When I first made a change to prevent the generation of en.xml and root.xml, I got this:
Verification failure, child without parent
Child, present: /Users/tbishop/Documents/WenlinDocs/Organizations/Unicode/CLDR_job/vetdata-2020-08-06T17-49-10-961Z/vxml/common/main/en_PR.xml
Parent, absent: /Users/tbishop/Documents/WenlinDocs/Organizations/Unicode/CLDR_job/vetdata-2020-08-06T17-49-10-961Z/vxml/common/main/en.xml
This change prevents that spurious failure, making it OK to have en_PR.xml without en.xml.
replies.author: btangmu
